constituent: castle, soil, dirt, ground, turn into, parade, sword, dagger
heisigStory: In this frame, we see a mound of dirt that is being turned into a castle (the way you may have done as a child playing on the beach).
koohiiStory1: The sand castle is just the soil (#150) that turns into a castle.
koohiiStory2: Someday this mound of dirt here will turn into our CASTLE, the ants think to themselves when scoping out a new ant hill.
myStory: chữ Thành. lâu đài. đất trở thành lâu đài. chữ địa + thành
